headline: This theater lover saw every Broadway show this season — and you won’t believe how cheap it was
summary: Ahead of the Tony Awards, Liz Davenport used every discount trick in the book to spend less than $50 a ticket on average. These are her best tips.

headline: My daughter will be on Medicaid for life. Can my wife and I invest in the stock market?
summary: Consider a special-needs trust, in addition to other safeguards.

headline: International stocks are ahead of the U.S. so far this year—how to add them to your portfolio
summary: After years of outperformance, U.S. stocks are lagging behind their foreign peers. Experts say it's worth holding some of both.

headline: As Lululemon’s stock tumbles, one analyst says ‘sell shares now.’ Others aren’t so sure.
summary: A “pivotal question” is whether the slowdown in the athleisure company’s U.S. business is temporary “or a sign of something more fundamental,” UBS says.

headline: Texas Roadhouse traffic rebounds. Here is what else the stock has going for it
summary: Momentum at Texas Roadhouse is bouncing back just in time for summer.

headline: Tesla’s stock is too expensive — even if Musk and Trump make up
summary: Also: Rules for investors as the S&P 500 claws its way back, how to manage bond-market risk and advice from the Moneyist.

headline: United partners with Spotify to add streaming audio to seatback screens
summary: United passengers will be able to listen to curated Spotify playlists, audiobooks and video podcasts directly from their seatback screens, starting this week.

headline: Circle’s stock is having another big day. What the blockbuster IPO has meant for other cryptocurrency plays.
summary: Recap of recent trading reveals a strong performance from stocks with exposure to digital currencies.

headline: Here’s how much a ‘Bro Billionaire’ group of stocks is trouncing small caps under Trump
summary: Small-cap stocks were supposed to benefit from deglobalization and other Trump policies.

headline: What’s behind Trump’s call for ‘a full point’ interest-rate cut?
summary: President Donald Trump on Friday pressed Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell for a full-point interest-rate cut, saying the central bank’s monetary policy was a “disaster.”
